The '''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a store page that is part of the [[Warbonds]] menu. It was released on 2024-04-11.

== Unlockables ==
=== Cost ===
{{Currency|Medals|230}} needed to unlock all pages.<br>
{{Currency|Medals|699|notext}} Medals needed to claim all items.<br>
{{Currency|SC|300}} available from pages.<br>
{{Currency|SC|1,000|notext}} Super Credits needed to unlock warbond.
